ValidationRule.description: send error if status is blocked, needs more info or failed testing and description is blacnk
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (TEXT(Status__c) = "Blocked" || TEXT(Status__c) = "Need more Info" || TEXT(Status__c) ="Failed Testing") && ISBLANK( Description__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter more information relating to the status of the issue in the Description Box
